author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bright Scholar Announces Acquisition Of Additional Equity Interests In Can-achieve
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Bright Scholar Education Holdings Ltd :
* BRIGHT SCHOLAR ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF ADDITIONAL EQUITY INTERESTS IN CAN-ACHIEVE
* BRIGHT SCHOLAR EDUCATION - WILL HOLD OF 70% EQUITY INTERESTS IN CAN-ACHIEVE AFTER CLOSING TRANSACTION FOR A TOTAL CONSIDERATION OF RMB262.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
